description: Two conquistadors, presumably searching for the mythical Fountain of Youth, are depicted in a tropical jungle setting, sweating profusely. They stare in dismay at a modern-looking snack bar serving sodas and snacks, conspicuously labeled "Yuth's Fountain & Snack Bar". This surreal juxtaposition of 16th-century explorers with a mundane contemporary establishment creates a strong sense of absurdism. The location is a literal but unmagical 'Fountain of Youth'. The scene presents a humorous irony where the epic quest for eternal life culminates in finding a sugary drink vendor.
caption: “When we get back, I’m gonna wring de León’s neck!”
